questions.quote: Yeah, your widower story's tested through the roof.  When are you getting out of there?
Well, at the latest. Oh hang on a second, I gotta another call.
[to himself] Argh! [to Susan] Susan! Hi! Oh, boy! What are you doing here?!
All right, I made up the part about the car, but the rest is true. And he hated me anyway!
Eh, anti-fur. I mean, who has the energy anymore? This is more about hanging off the arm of an idiot.
Don't go. Kramer! Come back. I got great news. Well, I did it.
Uh, well, I'll tell you what. Um, I'll give you a check, and then this person can pay me back.
Oh. Well, I'll tell you, a nice greeting card can really lift a person's spirits.
No, I got to warn him that I told Joe Devola about his party.
Look. This plane is *full*. I got a lot of people to serve. Now please... You're just gonna have to wait.
